column4: hey all, ive noticed my root partition to be filling up fast but i store most of my data on a seperate partition, any ideas what is taking up all this space, and how can i clean it up some
try apt-get clean and removing things from /tmp
network-manager - only available in dapper though
i tried network-mnager and it didnt work kepts saying something about unknown user bind.. know of any others or know how i can fix network-manager
